The series and its many cast members have been nominated for a variety of different awards national including Logie Awards and AWGIE Awards. and internationally like The British Soap Awards ==All About Soap Awards== The All About Soap Awards are held yearly by All About Soap magazine. {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref |- | 2010 || Bride and Doom || Belle and Aden's wedding || || align="center"| |- | 2011 || Best Comeback || Marilyn Chambers || || align="center"| |- |rowspan="2" | 2012 || Best Mystery || Who attacked Bianca? || |} ==Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts Awards== The Australian Academy of Cinema and Television Arts Awards are an annual awards ceremony presented by the Australian Film Institute and ==The British Soap Awards== The British Soap Awards began in 1999. They celebrate excellence in soap operas. {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref |- | 1999 || Best Foreign Soap || Home and Away || || align="center"| |- | 2000 || Best Foreign Soap || Home and Away || || align="center"| |- |} ==Digital Spy Reader Awards== The Digital Spy Soap Awards are hosted by the British entertainment and media website Digital Spy. The first awards were presented in 2008, where Home and Away was nominated in 12 of the 14 categories. {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref Awards are presented by The Equity Foundation, the performers branch of the Media, Entertainment and Arts Alliance (MEAA). Accolades are handed out to the best cast in a television comedy series, drama series and miniseries or TV film. {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref |- | 2013 || Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series || Cast of series 26 || || align="center"| |- |} ==Inside Soap Awards== The Inside Soap Awards are voted for by readers of Inside Soap magazine. Program || Home and Away || |- | Most Popular New Talent || Courtney Miller || |} ==National Television Awards== The National Television Awards are a British television awards ceremony. The NTAs results are voted for by the general public and the award categories are given the title of Most Popular. {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref |- | rowspan="2"| 1996 || Most Popular Newcomer || Nic Testoni || || align="center" rowspan="2"| |- | Most Popular Soap || Home and Away || |- | rowspan="2"| 1997 || Most Popular Newcomer || Ben Unwin || || align="center" rowspan="2"| |- | Most Popular Soap || Home and Away || |- |} ==Nickelodeon Australian Kids' Choice Award== The Nickelodeon Australian Kids' Choice Awards is an annual awards show usually held during October or November. It is televised and the winners are chosen and voted for by children. {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref |- | 2011 || Fave TV Show || Home and Away || || |- |} ==TV Tonight Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref |- | rowspan="2" | 2007 || Best Drama (Australian) || Home and Away || || |- | Best Female || Kate Ritchie || || |- | 2008 || Favourite Female || Kate Ritchie || || |- | rowspan="2"| 2009 || Worst Show (Australian) || Home and Away || || |- | Worst Female || Jodi Gordon || || |- |} ==TV Week and Soap Extra #OMGAwards== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !width="470"|Category !width="375"|Nominee !width="65"|Result !Ref |- | rowspan="15"| 2015 || Favourite Show || Home and Away || || rowspan="2"| |- | rowspan="4"| Favourite Couple || Brax and Ricky || |- | Leah and Zac || || rowspan="3"| |- | Nate and Kat || |- | Marilyn and John || |- | Best Storyline || Brax's fake death/escape || || rowspan="4"| |- | Best Wedding || Marilyn and John's || |- | Best Love Triangle || Ash, Phoebe and Kyle || |- | rowspan="2"| Best Shock Kiss || Ash and Phoebe || |- | Matt and Charlotte || || rowspan="2"| |- | Best Showdown || Hannah and Evelyn || |- | Best Villain || Sophie || || rowspan="3"| |- | Best BFFs || Leah and Irene || |- | rowspan="2"| Best Abs || Brax || |- | Nate || || |} ==Notes== Certain award groups do not simply award one winner. They recognize several different recipients and have runners-up. Since this is a specific recognition and is different from losing an award, runner-up mentions are considered wins in this award tally. ==References== Category:Lists of awards by television series Category:Home and Away
